constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 相邻点不同（即任意两个相邻点不重合）

constraints.name: distance_bound
constraints.description: 所有圆的半径和切线满足特定几何关系，确保每个圆与相邻圆相切且通过给定点D
constraints.formal: Each circle ω_i is tangent to the next circle ω_{i+1} and passes through point D

constraints.name: coverage
constraints.description: 生成的点集必须覆盖所有需要的点，包括通过生成函数生成的点
constraints.formal: The set of generated points must cover exactly n + 1 points, including D
